Package samuel.hintersteiner.timeaftertime

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • samuel.hintersteiner.timeaftertime.DBConnection
  • public class DBConnection
extends Object
    This class contains all of the database operations.

    1
    Author:
    Hintersteiner Samuel

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Connection getInstance()
        Gets the connection to the database. It is designed in singleton pattern.
        Returns:
        Database connection.

      • setup

        public static void setup()
                  throws SQLException
        Sets up the database with all tables and pastes the available priorities and major categories of the tasks.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is no database server connection.

      • queryClient

        public static Client queryClient​(String usernameToSearch)
                          throws NullPointerException,
                                 SQLException
        Queries the client corresponding to the given username.
        Parameters:
        usernameToSearch - Username that corresponds to the client to search.
        Returns:
        Client that corresponds to the given username.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If database connection is null.
        SQLException - If there is an error while querying the client.

      • insertClient

        public static void insertClient​(String firstName,
                                String lastName,
                                String email,
                                String username,
                                String password)
                         throws NullPointerException,
                                SQLException
        Inserts a database record for the new client.
        Parameters:
        firstName - First name.
        lastName - Last name.
        email - Email address.
        username - Username.
        password - Password.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.
        SQLException - If there is an error while inserting the client into the database.

      • queryAllTasks

        public static List<Task> queryAllTasks()
                                throws NullPointerException,
                                       SQLException
        Queries all tasks from the current client.
        Returns:
        All tasks from the current client.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.
        SQLException - If there is an error while querying the tasks from the database.

      • insertTask

        public static int insertTask​(String name,
                             Time duration,
                             Date deadlineDate,
                             Time deadlineTime,
                             int priorityNr,
                             boolean done,
                             int subCategoryNr,
                             int clientNr)
                      throws SQLException,
                             NullPointerException
        Inserts a new task into the database.
        Parameters:
        name - Task name.
        duration - Task duration.
        deadlineDate - Task deadline (date).
        deadlineTime - Task deadline (time).
        priorityNr - Number of task priority.
        done - If the task is done or not.
        subCategoryNr - Number of task sub category.
        clientNr - Number of client who owns/inserts this task.
        Returns:
        Auto-generated task number.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while inserting the task into the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • checkTask

        public static void checkTask​(int taskNr)
                      throws SQLException,
                             NullPointerException
        Checks a task.
        Parameters:
        taskNr - Number of the task that should be checked.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while updating the status of the task in the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • deleteTask

        public static void deleteTask​(int taskNr)
                       throws SQLException,
                              NullPointerException
        Deletes a task from the database.
        Parameters:
        taskNr - Number of the task that should be deleted.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while deleting the task from the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • editTask

        public static void editTask​(Task editedTask)
                     throws SQLException,
                            NullPointerException
        Edits a task in the database.
        Parameters:
        editedTask - The task with the new data.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while editing the task in the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • rebuildTask

                        throws SQLException,
                               NullPointerException
        Rebuilds a task in the database.
        Parameters:
        taskNr - Number of the task that should be rebuilt.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while updating the status of the task in the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • insertSubCategory

        public static int insertSubCategory​(String name,
                                    int categoryNr)
                             throws NullPointerException
        Inserts a new sub category into the database.
        Parameters:
        name - Sub category name.
        categoryNr - Major category number.
        Returns:
        Auto-generated sub category number.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • queryAllSubCategories

        public static List<SubCategory> queryAllSubCategories()
                                               throws NullPointerException,
                                                      SQLException
        Queries all sub categories in the database.
        Returns:
        A list of all available sub categories.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.
        SQLException - If there is an error while querying the sub categories inb the database.

        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

        passwordToHash - Password to hash.
        Returns:
        Hashed password.

      • insertImagePath

        public static void insertImagePath​(String imagePath)
                            throws SQLException
        Inserts the user image path into the database.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - Relative path where the image is saved in the resources directory of the project.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while inserting the image path into the database.

      • deleteImagePath

        public static void deleteImagePath()
                            throws NullPointerException,
                                   SQLException
        Deletes the user image path from the database.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.
        SQLException - If there is an error while deleting the image path from the database.

      • stringToSQLTime

        public static Time stringToSQLTime​(String time)
        Converts a string to java.sql.Time object.
        Parameters:
        time - Time in String format.
        Returns:
        Time in java.sql.Time format.

      • setPassword

        public static void setPassword​(Client client,
                               String newPassword)
                        throws SQLException,
                               NullPointerException
        Sets a new password for the respectively client.
        Parameters:
        client - The respectively client.
        newPassword - The new password.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while changing the password in the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • deleteClient

        public static void deleteClient()
                         throws SQLException,
                                NullPointerException
        Deletes user profile.
        Throws:
        SQLException - If there is an error while deleting the user profile in the database.
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection.

      • close

        public static void close()
                  throws NullPointerException,
                         SQLException
        Closes the connection to the database.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If there is no database connection that can be closed.
        SQLException - If a database access error occurs.
